attributes.comment: CMS should also include the providers who are providing services to the incarcerated population as these individuals are consuming various healthcare services when in the Criminal Justice lifecycle, they need the similar healthcare services when they are release back into the community.  This is important as these individuals don’t have the information on the services provided by various healthcare providers and the benefits they accept.
